generalInfo.title: Please provide the following details to complete your profile setup. You can always update this information in your account settings later, but for now, it's important for us to know who you are.
generalInfo.textFieldLabel: Describe in short your professional status
generalInfo.helperText: Inputs with the * sign are required
generalInfo.checkboxAgeVerification: I confirm that I am over 18 years old

experience.title: Describe your professional experience. Maximum 70 characters.

languages.title: Please select the relevant data to set up your profile. Other categories you can add in your account settings later.

categories.title: Please select the relevant data to set up your profile. Other categories you can add in your account settings later.

photo.description: Please select your photo to set up your profile. You can change this in your account settings later.
photo.typeError: Wrong file type. Only .png/.jpg/.jpeg files are allowed.
photo.fileSizeError: Size for one file cannot be more than 10MB.

errorMessage: Error! Please complete all required fields before submitting.
errorPhotoUploadMessage: Error! Photo can not be uploaded.
